A digital wallet

KeePassX

1Password is equivalent to KeePassX. If you have a licensed copy, use it.


KeePassX is a Password Manager that can store different types of information including:

  • user names
  • passwords
  • urls
  • comments and notes

The entire database is encrypted using a master password.


Download KeePassX available for Mac, Windows, iOS, and Android

https://www.keepassx.org/downloads/
